channel.title: [PI] Changing Default Options and Curses
channel.description:
How do I set default options (in the options tab). For example, brightness and music sound. Whenever I close the client, they go back to zero brightness level and full music sound. I want to make it so it stays that one brightness level or music level even if I close the client, or just change what it is set at when I close/open the client.
I also have curses on my server. I have a command that activate curse prayers, but when I log off and back in, it's back at normal prayers. How do I make it stay on curse prayers forever?

item.title: [PI] Changing Default Options and Curses
